attributes.action: Reinstate Sausage2 as angony uncle for E-Goat
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the under signed request that the Prime minister to order the useless lazy drug addict that is known as S2 to take over his problem page from some up-start who has muscled in on his turf, I understand this will be hard do to S2's class A drug addiction and the fact he can not be bothered to get off his arse or put down his bottle of meths.

Since you can not be bothered to run the country properly perhaps you can at least do this for us.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
